analysis.description:
Altcoin.startDate (/unique_chucks/29/0xe8a8a7a8f041fa5a2ee5e7181bf1b2c96a415683.sol#111-112) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- fallback (/unique_chucks/29/0xe8a8a7a8f041fa5a2ee5e7181bf1b2c96a415683.sol#221-233)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/29/0xe8a8a7a8f041fa5a2ee5e7181bf1b2c96a415683.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/29/0xe8a8a7a8f041fa5a2ee5e7181bf1b2c96a415683.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/29/0xe8a8a7a8f041fa5a2ee5e7181bf1b2c96a415683.sol#89) is not in mixedCase
